citations.narrative:
A mouse was observed climbing out of the chest freezer containing the food pellets for the hoof stock. The pelleted food
is located inside a plastic container with a tightly fitting lid, within the unplugged freezer. There are provisions for rodent
control at the facility, however, there are no provisions within this food storage area.. Assure a safe and effective program
for the control of rodents in established and maintained in this area..
Correct by: 1-18-22
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
A mouse was observed climbing out of the chest freezer containing the food pellets for the hoof stock.  The pelleted food 
is located inside a plastic container with a tightly fitting lid, within the unplugged freezer.  There are provisions for rodent 
control at the facility, however, there are no provisions within this food storage area..  Assure a safe and effective program 
for the control of rodents in established and maintained in this area.. 
Correct by: 1-18-22 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
